name: Hotel Charlotte - Cartagena de Indias

reviews.title: Hotel Charlotte
reviews.text: I really enjoyed my stay at the Hotel Charlotte in Cartagena. It is a small art deco hotel located in the Boca Grande area of Cartagena. There are numerous stores, restaurants and cafes all in walking distance. And the beach is only one block away.

description: Located in Cartagena de Indias, on the shores of the Caribbean Sea and declared Historical Heritage of Humankind by UNESCO, is situated the Hotel Charlotte Cartagena. We offer an exclusive environment with excellent quality and service in Bocagrande, the main tourist zone of the city.
